title: Interpretation of seeing a palace in a dream Entering a palace in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dream of a spacious palace in a dream for a single woman, the king’s white palace, the villa, the girl’s large palace. A palace in a dream denotes a bad and corrupt person. A narrow prison and lack of money. An explanation for a good and secret man. Raising the matter and fulfilling debts. If one sees it from afar, it is a king. The palace also indicates a hidden person. He has good intentions and awareness. Whoever enters a palace in his dream will become an important person and will do good to others with everything he has. Whoever sees in his dream that he is in charge of a palace will raise his status if the palace is his, and become a great man. If the palace belongs to others, there will be benefit and goodness from this. The palace: The palace in a dream is a good deed for the dreamer. Whoever enters the palace and is single gets married. The palace, if he is in the city in the dream, the dreamer is a great person among those around him. The dream of the palace shows the state’s money, power, and pleasure. If you enter a palace in a dream, you have gained status, power, and money, especially if the palace is owned. For you, but if you enter someone else’s palace in a dream, this means benefit and goodness for you. Interpretation of the palace in one dream: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a beautiful, luxurious, and wonderful palace, then she is waiting for a great surprise with the size and grandeur of the palace. But if an unmarried woman enters a spacious and magnificent palace, she will marry a rich man, a scholar, or a famous and famous person. But if an unmarried woman sees herself entering the presidential palace or the royal court, this is a sign of a prestigious position. Interpretation of seeing a palace in a married woman’s dream: The palace in a married woman’s dream symbolizes her home, family, or husband. If the palace is spacious and full of furniture and carpets, it means a happy life and the fulfillment of wishes. The palace is also a symbol of the husband himself, and its condition indicates the conditions of the husband, and the woman who saw the harshness of life in the past, and the palace in her dream brings her good news and a change for the better, as debts and worries are removed, the wife rejoices in stability and rejoices in the success of her children or the marriage of her daughters. The palace in a woman’s dream Pregnant Woman: As for the palace in a pregnant woman’s dream, it is like the palace in a married woman’s dream because it indicates stability, well-being, the end of problems, and the arrival of happy days, with some difference in terms of symbolism, as indicated by the palace. The male child and the bright future that awaits him. The spacious palace in a dream. The spacious palace in a dream is a symbol of ample sustenance, high status, or good luck. Seeing it in a merchant’s dream is profit, a bachelor’s dream is marriage, a student’s dream is success, a sick person’s dream is healing, an ambitious young man sleeps, travels, The spacious palace is a sign of glory and the fulfillment of great desires. It is for single people and comfort. The dream of a spacious palace remains one of the most prominent dreams that indicate goodness. Whoever sees it in his dream will be happy and will forget his misery forever. The white palace in a dream. As for the white palace in a dream, it is a sign of one who is righteous in his religion, a scholar. Beneficial with his knowledge, a just ruler, a kind father, a generous husband, a virtuous or virtuous son. It symbolizes the heart of a believer or a good deed, and it is also said that it is legitimate, and behind it is an abundance of money and profit. Interpretation of seeing a palace in the

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a dead person in a dream and knowing the good and evil of seeing a dead person in a dream for single women, married women, and pregnant women, and the interpretation of seeing a dead person alive and a gift for the dead person in a dream, based on what was stated in the dream interpretation books. The dream of the dead is a recurring vision for many people, so they ask what is the interpretation. Dreaming of a dead person in a dream, what is the interpretation of seeing dead people? Someone crying? Also, what is the interpretation of the dead being alive? Then we will learn in detail the best interpretation of seeing the dead according to the leading Arab interpreters and scholars. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the deceased in Nablus. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the dead in a dream and proof that the dreamer feels nostalgia for the dead. Seeing the deceased as if he was wearing something on the top of his body or wearing jewelry is evidence of his high status and acceptance. God. If the dreamer sees that the dead person is telling him that he is still alive, this indicates that he is in a wave of happiness in the afterlife. Interpretation of the dream in which the dead person calls you in a dream and this indicates that the dreamer must pray for the dead for mercy. As for A dreamer who sees a deceased person and asks him to leave his place of residence, and the dreamer responds, is evidence that the dreamer needs to change his character and personality because he is doing things that harm him without knowing it. The interpretation of the dead person speaking in a dream explains the desire of the dead person to give advice to the monarch, which will make him better off. Interpretation Dreaming of seeing a dead person by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing a dead person alive is evidence that the dreamer will attain goodness and abundance in his life. As for dreaming of a dead mother as if she were alive, it is evidence of the arrival of relief after severe distress and anxiety. Also, dreaming of seeing your dead wife alive indicates that the dreamer He will be affected by poverty. Seeing a dead son alive in a dream means that he will triumph over his enemy. Seeing a dead daughter alive in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will gain joy and happiness after going through many sorrows. The interpretation of seeing a dead brother alive in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be upset. As for the interpretation of a dream about an unknown dead person who lived alive, this indicates the safety of the dreamer’s condition. Seeing the deceased alive and the dreamer seeing him in his home indicates that he is in good health. And dreaming of a dead person being happy when he sees him in his home indicates this reward and charity that reaches him. And the appearance of the dead person. Looking well in a dream indicates the beauty of his end on the Day of Resurrection. The interpretation of seeing the deceased coexist in a dream indicates the dreamer’s journey. By seeing the dead, he has become rich and is evidence that he is one of God’s righteous servants. The interpretation of dreaming of the deceased wearing green clothes in a dream symbolizes his death as a martyr. Seeing the dead praying with the living indicates their negligence in the duties of worship and obedience. Interpretation of dreams of the dead sleeping in a dream, and this indicates his sense of comfort. Interpretation of seeing the dead as a fortress, and evidence of a sense of security. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a dead person by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person in a dream while he is naked is evidence On his lack. Whoever sees in himself a clear toll of the dead shows that he is surrounded by hypocrites. If the dreamer sees that his daughter died in a dream, this means that he feels despair about the arrival of his comfort. Seeing the

title: Interpretation of applying henna in a dream: seeing henna inscriptions on the hand and foot in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dreaming about henna in a dream for a married woman For a single woman For a pregnant woman For a single man, on both legs On the body, on the chest, on the shoulder, on the head Buying from the market I dreamed about We put henna and more on Ibn Shirin Seeing henna in a dreamHenna in a dream symbolizes change for the better , so be optimistic about the new change that is happening in your life, whether it is in work, passion, family or social life. Henna on the hand can symbolize a single person’s dream of marriage and good luck. Henna on the hand symbolizes a near recovery for you if you are sick or For a patient you care about. If you are married and see your mother giving you henna, this symbolizes that you will have children. If you are single and see a henna inscription in a dream and feel joy and happiness while it is engraved, this symbolizes that you will get married soon and you will be happy with henna inscription for brides. If you are single and see a henna inscription in a dream Without feeling happy, this warns you of a marriage that you do not want. Seeing the henna inscription on others symbolizes the bliss of the heart, happiness, and a feeling of peace and tranquility. If you are married and see the henna inscription in a dream, then goodness in work, living, and halal money will belong to your husband, making the family comfortable Financially in the next stage. If you see henna inscriptions on the palms of your hands, this means that you will soon give birth to a child and give birth to a child. Writing henna on the feet is evidence of expatriation and travel for you or a friend or relative. Dreaming about henna indicates happiness in general, and for an unmarried woman to see it on Her hands are marriage, pleasure, comfort of the heart, and bliss. Seeing henna in your hair means covering, covering, changing circumstances for the better, repairing and alleviating them. If you are married, henna in your dream indicates that you will improve your situation with your husband, and if you see henna on your hands, it means birth. Henna of your legs, if you are single, is evidence of Marriage through travel. Eating henna leaves in a dream symbolizes recovery from illness. Henna in its meaning for females, such as unmarried and unmarried girls, indicates joy and happiness and can indicate engagement and marriage in many cases. Henna for a married or pregnant woman is an increase in happiness , moving to sorrows and closeness in the family and in general, henna is joy, happiness, and the end of worries, and whoever sees a married woman giving birth or carrying that. The henna on her hands interferes with each other, it will be a disaster for her children. Carving one hand without the other will take a long time if she does not intend to carve the second or insists on not carving it or she finishes the first and it is not completed, then she may face sadness and pain for herself and not for others. And whoever sees Married women, her husband, her children, or her family paint with henna, then he will do good for her in proportion to her good. If the one who painted it with henna or carved it with his hand, male or female, was happy or pleased with her in his dream, then this is evidence of joy and happiness, and the loss of worry and sadness. , healing and closeness to family. .If it is a girl...

title: Interpretation of a dream about harassing a brother in a dream about a married woman according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a brother abusing a married woman in Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream. A dream about a brother abusing a married woman is one of the dreams that comes to the minds of many married women, and it is clear at first glance that it is a dream that carries many positive meanings and connotations, whereas this topic was opposed before. Many interpreters of dreams, this means that the interpretation is different in it. Note that it is a dream that does not only come to a married woman, but rather comes to the minds of many people during their dreams. Interpretation of a dream of a brother harassing a married woman by Imam Al-Sadiq. It should be noted that in the interpretation of a married woman’s dream of harming her brother in a dream, there are many connotations, meanings and interpretations mentioned by many interpretation scholars. Among them is Imam Al-Sadiq. If a married woman sees that her daughter is being harassed in a dream, this means that someone is trying to distort her image in reality. As for a married woman who sees harassment in a dream, this indicates her fears of harassment in reality. For a married woman to dream that she may She is exposed to harassment, crying and screaming, this means that she is suffering from a great injustice. Imam Al-Sadiq said that seeing a married woman in a dream being harassed in her workplace, this is evidence of her dissatisfaction with this job. Interpretation of a dream about harassment of a single woman by Imam Al-Sadiq, and in the context of Imam Al-Sadiq’s hadith about the interpretation of a vision A dream about a brother harassing a married woman. He talked in detail about the interpretations and meanings of the dream and saw that the body cannot be considered positive in the dream. Or negative, because it depends on the circumstances under which it appears in the dream, as follows: Imam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing harassment in a dream indicates the harassment that the dreamer faces in his life from the people around him. He considered it an indication of deception, treachery and treachery. And in the interpretation of seeing harassment In a dream for an unmarried woman, Imam Al-Sadiq said that this indicates that he will soon experience embarrassing situations. Seeing a stranger harassing single women means that she will end her relationship with her fiancé or the person she loves. The dream of harassing an unmarried woman by Ibn SirinWhile the scholar Ibn Sirin had other opinions on Interpretation of a dream about a brother harassing an unmarried woman in a dream. Many interpretations and clues were found to interpret the dream, including the following interpretations: The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that this dream indicates that an unmarried woman will be forced to do things that she does not like. The interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about harassing an unmarried woman differed. Married in his relationship with the harasser, whether you know him, acquaintance, relative, or unknown. Likewise, Ibn Sirin explained that some interpretations of a stranger harassing a girl indicate that she will receive unpleasant news. Finally, harassment in a dream indicates weakness of character and inability to impose your opinion on Others.Ibn Sirin’s dream of harassment. In Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of sexual harassment, there were many connotations and interpretations that he came up with, which differed depending on the nature of the person being harassed, including his interpretations of the dream of harassment of a pregnant woman, which resulted in the following: Harassment in a pregnant woman’s dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about receiving a gift from a familiar person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about receiving a gift from a famous person in a dream can make a mistake and be beaten, in addition to the fact that the site and its administrators have nothing to do with the interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about receiving a gift from a familiar person in a dreamIn the case of the personal view of receiving a gift in a dream, this may indicate love and appreciation from That person. A person’s dream that he received a gift in a dream may indicate good changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life during this period. In the event that you see yourself receiving a gift from someone in a dream, this may indicate achieving goals and aspirations thanks to God. Seeing yourself receiving a gift From a familiar person in a dream may indicate new events that may occur in the dreamer’s life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving banknotes in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he received a lot of banknotes may indicate happiness and joy in life. Dreaming of receiving banknotes in a dream indicates the marital happiness that the dreamer was enjoying in his life at that time. Seeing paper money in a dream may indicate the diligence of a visionary in achieving his goals and ambitions. In the event that a married woman sees that she received banknotes in a dream, and There are many of them, so this may indicate the happiness that she was enjoying in her life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about someone taking medicine in a dream: It is possible that the vision of taking medicine indicates the dreamer’s good circumstances, thanks to God. Anyone can dream that Taking medicine from someone indicates the strength of his relationship with him and his strong love. Seeing someone taking medicine in a dream may indicate good changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this time. If the girl sees that she is taking medicine from someone, this may indicate happiness. Which will come in her life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving a slaughtered and clean chicken in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he has been slaughtered and cleaned chicken, it can indicate that his condition will change for the better, thanks to God. In the case of my personal opinion, he received a clean chicken. Very well, this may indicate good changes in his life in those days. It is possible that the vision of receiving a slaughtered and clean chicken in a dream indicates a new experience that the dreamer will enter during this period. In my personal opinion, that he took a slaughtered chicken and cleaned the dream, it may indicate the ability of the dreamer. The vision is about achieving the goals and aspirations of that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting a lock of hair in a dream: Seeing a lock of hair in a dream may indicate some difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life and that he will overcome. Anyone who sees in a dream that he got a lock of hair can indicate Positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life during these days. If one sees that he has taken a lock of hair from another person, this may indicate that he has achieved goals and ambitions thanks to God. Whoever dreams that someone has taken a lock of his hair may indicate a great loss that may The person with vision at that time suffers from it, and God knows best. title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing pigment in a dream?

preview.html: Hadout website provides you with an interpretation of seeing dye completely in a dream. It is known as a dyer who specializes in dyeing fabrics and many things and changing their color. Also, many people have a complete vision of dye in a dream. We provide you, dear followers, with all the correct and reliable details from the main books of scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. Everything related to the interpretation of seeing a dyer in a dream is complete for men and women, as well as all the evidence and interpretation of everything similar to this vision. If you are only interested in knowing the interpretation, then you should follow the article. What is the interpretation of Al-Nabulsi's morning vision? Al-Nabulsi, may God have mercy on him, said in his book about the complete morning vision in a dream that this is evidence of a false companion. Also, seeing paint in a dream is a sign of good luck for the dreamer and an indication of a successful partner. Seeing a dyer in a complete dream means that the dreamer has repented of all his sins, is on the path of leadership, and is close to God Almighty. Also, seeing the white color in a complete dream is a sign of great goodness and imminent marriage for an unmarried dreamer. But if the dreamer sees a complete man painted in black in a dream, this indicates his distance from religion and from God Almighty and is evidence of his apostasy from religion. What is the interpretation of seeing a dyer for an ordinary woman? Interpretation of seeing dye in a complete dream for an ordinary woman is evidence of the presence of a person with a distorted color that does not suit her in life and suits her. Also, seeing the white or red color in a complete dream indicates that her wedding date is approaching and that her wedding will be completed well. Seeing a girl in green and white in a complete dream testifies to the strength of her religion, good morals, and relationships Kindness to people. Why does a dyer dream of a married woman? Seeing a married woman colored in a dream and painted in white, red or green means great blessing, support and stability for her life. But seeing a married woman in a dream full and painted in black is an unpleasant vision, indicating great sadness. Seeing a yellow shade in a dream means illness and fatigue that she will suffer from in her life. Why does a dyer dream of a pregnant woman? The color in the dream is completely, which is painted in white or green, indicates an easy and affordable birth and an improvement in her health. Also, the dye in a pregnant woman's dream indicates that God will give her a male child, and God knows what is in the womb. Why does a man dream? A bag in a dream full of men shows a free owner and always says words of love beyond what he feels. In addition, seeing a golden color in a dream of a single young man is a good sign of a close marriage with a beautiful girl with a good personality and good appearance. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a table in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Table in a dream A table or table is a medium that people use to eat, write, or other things, and seeing it in a dream makes the dreamer wonder about the different meanings of this dream and does it bring goodness or portend evil? All of this and more will be explained in detail in the following lines of the article. Table in a dream. Jurists have mentioned many connotations in interpreting a dream about a table, the most important of which are the following: If a man sees a table in a dream, this is a sign of his soon marriage, stability, and enjoyment of a life free of problems, constant arguments, and obstacles. Others that could stand in his way. The table in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes the desires that she wants to achieve in the future. Seeing a wooden table in a dream indicates the dreamer’s feeling of peace, security, and psychological calm. As for seeing a copper table in a dream, it shows an unfortunate fate that causes harm. Psychologically for the dreamer. When a person dreams of a gold table, this proves that God - Glory be to Him - will give him a beautiful woman to marry and make him happy in his life. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search on Google, a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. The table in a dream by Ibn Sirin, mentioned by the great Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him. The table in a dream has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: Whoever dreams that he is sitting at the table with someone, this is a sign of a happy life, a broad diet, and abundant kindness that he enjoys. If a person sees in his dream a very elegant table with delicious food on it, this symbolizes To the happiness that awaits him in the coming days. If one sees in his dream that he is sitting at home at a table with a loved one, the dream indicates the peace of mind that he feels and the removal of anxiety and distress from his chest. If you are sitting at a large table with your partners during sleep, This is a sign that he has made great profits in this business. Seeing the table outside the home means breaking away from work and earning money that improves financial conditions. The table in Al-Osaimi’s dreamDr. Fahd Al-Osaimi - may God have mercy on him - reported that if an unmarried girl dreams that she is preparing the table, then this It will lead to joy that will visit her home because of her future marriage, God willing. If a married woman sees that she is preparing for the feast and there are many tables for many guests, this is a sign that she will receive good news soon. When a man dreams that his wife is preparing a large table and he is the only one sitting at it, This is a sign that he will have good children and live in stability and bliss with his family members. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her husband invited her to a large dining room, this indicates love, understanding and respect between them. A table in a dream for a single woman. A table in a person’s dream symbolizes prosperity and a feeling of peace. And calm. If a girl dreams that she is sitting at a table with a lot of food that she likes, this is a sign that she will soon achieve what she wants. When single women see an empty wooden table in their dream, this indicates their tendency to enter into a romantic relationship with someone

title: Interpretation of seeing a brother in a dream for a single woman and in all circumstances according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a brother in a dream for an unmarried woman and all cases according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. There are many people around a person who greatly influence him and can influence his soul and future. One of the most important of these people is the brother who is considered the greatest support and support for his brothers, and the appearance of a brother in a dream is linked to the meanings of a lot. They will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a brother in a dream for a single woman and all cases according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a brother in a dream for an unmarried woman. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says in his book Interpretation of Dreams that seeing a brother in a dream indicates the presence of feelings of security in the dreamer’s life. Also, seeing a brother in a dream symbolizes the strong bond between the dreamer and his brothers and shows the exchange of feelings of love between them. If the sleeper sees his brother in his dream, this indicates his attachment to him and his love, and there is a strong relationship between them. And if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is talking with his brother, this is good news. The dreamer may hear good news in the near future and happy events will appear in his life in the coming period. And if the sleeper sees in his dream that his brother was in a state of great happiness, then this is a good vision that promises the dreamer a lot of money in the near future. And if this brother gets sick, and the sleeper sees in His dream is that his brother has died, so this is a vision that indicates the death of that brother, and only God Almighty knows the time. Imam Ibn Sirin says that seeing a quarrel between brothers in a dream is a praiseworthy and good vision, which indicates the presence of strong bonds and feelings of love and tenderness between brothers in reality. If the sleeper sees in his dream that his brother has fallen ill, then this is a bad vision that indicates that the dreamer will fall into some crises and troubles in the coming period, and he will have to pray to God again and again for the suffering to be over. . bad. Pick it up. Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is marrying her brother, then this is a good vision that foretells the girl who dreamed of hearing good news in the near future, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her mother gave birth to a new brother, then this is a vision A good dream promises the dreamer that he will live a life full of happiness and prosperity and achieve all the goals he wants. She is struggling in her life. Seeing the birth of a brother in an unmarried girl’s dream means many changes in her life in the coming period, and all of these changes will be for the better, and these changes may be engagement or marriage in the near future, success for the girl in her studies, or obtaining a prestigious position in the future. near. Urgent.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a brother’s death in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her brother has died, then this is a good vision that tells her that God Almighty will grant her a long and blessed life. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream her brother being buried after his death, then this is an unpleasant vision that indicates Many disagreements appear in the life of the dreaming girl, and this vision also indicates strong enmity between the girl. The one who had the dream and her brothers. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a brother beaten in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a slit

title: Interpretation of seeing an image of the sea in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing the sea in a dream is one of the most beautiful, peaceful dreams that indicate a person’s need to empty himself, feel distressed, and desire to obtain interpretations. It is related to the psyche of the dreamer at the time of seeing the dream, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a depiction of the sea in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of dreams about seeing the sea in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing sea water from afar means serious turmoil and distress, as if one sees In his dream, the sea water had decreased, so he said a lot. Great anxiety. If one sees that he is swimming well in the sea and then drowns, this indicates that whoever saw him will die as a witness. If one sees in his dream that he is urinating in the sea, this indicates that the dreamer is committing many forbidden things and continues to do them. If one sees in a dream that he is urinating in the sea, then this indicates that the dreamer is committing many forbidden things and continues to do them. If he dives into the sea until he reaches the bottom of the sea and the mud stains his clothes, this means that the dreamer will fall into a great misfortune and will be overcome by great sadness and sorrow. . Horror and serious problems in the coming period. Interpretation of dreams about seeing the sea in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that sea water shows great disaster and sadness. If a person sees that the sea water has shrunk and turned into a small chasm, this indicates the departure of the ruler of the country from it and the collapse of the country, but if A person sees that he is floating in clear sea water, then this indicates achieving goals and the ability to reach what he wants easily. If a person sees in a dream that he is swimming in the sea and that that person is suffering from an illness, then this vision shows the seriousness of the illness in him, but if a person sees that he is drowning in Sea water and he cannot swim, it indicates the death of the dreamer. If one sees that he is swimming in the sea quickly and with great skill, and this person is engaged in trade, then this vision indicates that he will achieve a lot of money and profit in the coming period, but if the sheikh is an employee, this indicates That he will rise in positions. If one sees in a dream that he is drinking sea water until he is completely satisfied, this indicates that the dreamer will gain a significant increase in knowledge and money and that he will soon become close to the sultan or ruler. Interpretation of a dream about seeing dry sea water in a dream. Dream interpretation jurists say: Whoever sees in a dream that the sea water has dried up and dried up, this indicates the collapse of the country and its exposure to the possession of enemies. Misery, dehydration, and dehydration. But if one sees that the sea water has dried up and that he is swimming in the sea sand, this indicates many problems, troubles, and great fears that the viewer may face or be exposed to in the coming period. . He was punished by the governor of the state.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a small lake in a dream Interpretation by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin says that seeing a small lake in a dream indicates the presence of a disgraceful woman in the life of the person who sees it, and this vision also indicates problems, especially if they are deep and do not pass. But if If a person dreams in a dream that he is drinking lake water and that the water is cloudy, this indicates that the dreamer has committed a lot in his life

As for if one sees that the sea water has dried up and that he is swimming in the sea sand, this indicates many problems, troubles and great concerns that the viewer may face in the coming period or be exposed to. . He was punished by the governor of the state. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a small lake in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a small lake in a dream indicates the presence of a shameful woman in the life of the person who sees it, and this vision also indicates special problems if they are deep and do not pass. As for if one dreams in a dream that he is drinking from the lake water and that the water is cloudy, this indicates that the dreamer has committed a lot in his life
